raw_desc: 【Elegant & Stylish 4-in-1 Gift Kit】A great one-stop solution for wine opening, pouring and preserving that can save time and energy, making it a nice gift for any wine lover. Combo of wine bottle opener, foil cutter, wine aerator pourer and 2 vacuum wine stoppers. Great gift for yourself, family and friends. 【Easy to Use】Compatible with most wine bottle sizes, the electric wine opener can open red, white, rose wine or any other drinks with corks in 6~8 seconds. Place the wine opener vertically and press the "lower" button to remove the cork from the bottle, and then pressing the "upper" button can release the cork. 【Powerful & Durable】Powered by 4 AA alkaline batteries (not included), this wine bottle opener is with a powerful and fast cork removal function, which can open up to 100 wine bottles at one time. All tools are made of premium and non-toxic materials, bringing you a better using experience. 【Wine Opener with Foil Cutter】Wonderful design wine opener with lightweight foil cutter can remove seals neatly with one quick twist. The cutter can be locked and stored at the bottom of the wine opener as a stand, convenient and won't be lost in the daily life. 【Drip-Free & Fresh Flavor】The wine accessories are made of food grade materials which are entirely safe. The aerator pourer is ergonomically designed, and its spout ensures Drip-Proof wine pouring and can enhance the flavor of wine. Indulge in premium wine goodness with every sip. 2 vacuum wine stoppers can preserve your wine without wasting, keeping wine fresh for long.
